name: Cavena Subtitles File
summary: Learn about .890 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The 890 format is proprietary but is still supported by third party applications. Cavena provides a program called Toolbox that can export 890 files to the standard EBU .STL format.

description: Movie subtitles file format created by Cavena, an organization that develops subtitle preparation, transmission, and postproductions solutions; saves a list of subtitles with timestamps that synchronize the closed captions with video.
